statements: SELECT * FROM disposal_locations WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT location_name, material_type FROM disposal_locations WHERE capacity > 1000;
SELECT * FROM disposal_locations WHERE material_type = 'Plastic' AND capacity < 500;
SELECT city, COUNT(*) AS Total_Locations FROM disposal_locations GROUP BY city;
SELECT location_name, address, city FROM disposal_locations ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM disposal_locations WHERE material_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY capacity DESC, location_name ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT location_name, city, capacity FROM disposal_locations WHERE city = 'New York'
SELECT location_name, material_type, city FROM disposal_locations WHERE capacity >= 1000 AND city LIKE 'L%' ORDER BY material_type ASC
SELECT location_id, address FROM disposal_locations WHERE material_type IN ('Glass', 'Paper') AND city != 'Chicago'
SELECT * FROM disposal_locations WHERE capacity > 500 ORDER BY city ASC, location_name DESC
SELECT * FROM disposal_locations;
SELECT id, location_name FROM disposal_locations WHERE material_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT location_name, material_type FROM disposal_locations WHERE disposal_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM recyclable_materials WHERE recycle_category = 'Paper';
SELECT material_id, material_name, recycle_category FROM recyclable_materials WHERE material_name LIKE '%Metal%';
SELECT * FROM disposal_locations WHERE material_type = 'Plastic' ORDER BY disposal_date DESC;
SELECT location_name, material_type FROM disposal_locations WHERE disposal_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_name, material_name, recycle_category FROM disposal_locations JOIN recyclable_materials ON disposal_locations.material_type = recyclable_materials.material_name;
SELECT disposal_date, COUNT(*) AS disposal_count FROM disposal_locations GROUP BY disposal_date ORDER BY disposal_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM recyclable_materials WHERE recycle_category = 'Paper' ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM disposal_locations;
SELECT location_name, address FROM disposal_locations WHERE capacity > 0;
SELECT material_name, description FROM recyclable_materials ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT location_name, quantity, disposal_date FROM disposal_records WHERE disposal_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT location_name, material_name, quantity FROM disposal_records INNER JOIN disposal_locations ON disposal_records.location_id = disposal_locations.id INNER JOIN recyclable_materials ON disposal_records.material_id = recyclable_materials.id;
SELECT * FROM disposal_locations;
SELECT * FROM recyclable_materials WHERE id = 1;
SELECT material_name, description FROM recyclable_materials WHERE id = 2;
SELECT location_name, address, capacity FROM disposal_locations ORDER BY capacity DESC;

SELECT d.location_name, r.material_name, dr.quantity FROM disposal_locations d INNER JOIN disposal_records dr ON d.id = dr.location_id INNER JOIN recyclable_materials r ON dr.material_id = r.id WHERE dr.quantity > 100 ORDER BY dr.quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM disposal_locations;
SELECT location_name, address FROM disposal_locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM recyclable_materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT location_name, contact_person FROM disposal_locations WHERE location_id = 2;
SELECT username, email FROM disposal_users;
SELECT location_name, address, contact_person FROM disposal_locations WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT material_name FROM recyclable_materials WHERE material_id > 10 ORDER BY material_name DESC;

SELECT location_name, disposal_date FROM disposal_locations JOIN disposal_records ON disposal_locations.location_id = disposal_records.location_id WHERE disposal_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM disposal_records WHERE quantity > 1000 AND disposal_date < '2022-06-30';

SELECT d.location_name, r.material_name, d.disposal_date, d.quantity FROM disposal_locations d JOIN disposal_records r ON d.location_id = r.location_id ORDER BY d.location_name ASC, r.material_name DESC, d.disposal_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM RecyclableMaterials;
SELECT material_name, disposal_location FROM RecyclableMaterials WHERE id = 1;
SELECT glass_type FROM GlassMaterials WHERE collection_point = 'North';
SELECT paper_type, collection_point FROM PaperMaterials ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT plastic_type, collection_point FROM PlasticMaterials WHERE id > 3;
SELECT id, material_name, disposal_location FROM RecyclableMaterials WHERE id = 1;
SELECT glass_type, collection_point FROM GlassMaterials WHERE id > 10 ORDER BY glass_type ASC;
SELECT paper_type, collection_point FROM PaperMaterials WHERE paper_type = 'Cardboard' ORDER BY collection_point DESC;
SELECT plastic_type, collection_point FROM PlasticMaterials WHERE collection_point LIKE '%East%';
SELECT metal_type, collection_point FROM MetalMaterials WHERE metal_type IN ('Aluminum', 'Copper') ORDER BY collection_point ASC;
